item.title: Research & Education
item.description: Research Broadly speaking, I am interested in discrete mathematics, especially number theory, combinatorics, and finite fields. For my PhD, I am currently working on various problem related to equations of restricted height. During my bachelor and master studies, I did a total of two final projects on some objects over finite fields. However, I am open for learning other topics. Publications Muhammad Afifurrahman, Vivian Kuperberg, Alina Ostafe, and Igor E. Shparlinski.

item.title: Links & Musings
item.description: Mettamatika Project Other links Here are my English and Indonesian blogs (which are infrequently updated). During pandemic, I often crash into some online mathematical research seminars from Research Seminars webpage. In fact, I first knew my doctoral advisor from the Number Theory Web Seminar that she organizes. I like binge-reading mathematical blogs; in particular, Terence Tao’s and Igor Pak’s are worth reading. I started to listen to some worldwide radio at Radio Garden.
